duck: Stepwise refinement - Top-down and bottom-up are strategies of information processing and knowledge ordering, mostly involving software, but also other humanistic and scientific theories (see systemics).
Stepwise reaction - A stepwise reaction is a chemical reaction with one or more reaction intermediates and involving at least two consecutive elementary reactions.
Stepwise regression - In statistics, stepwise regression includes regression models in which the choice of predictive variables is carried out by an automatic procedure.
stepwise definition: marked by or proceeding in steps.

wiki.text:
'Stepwise' may refer to: *Stepwise reaction *Stepwise refinement *Stepwise
regression
